content: चकित {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [चक् कर्तरिक्त] {@--1@} Shaking, trembling (through fear); भय°, साध्वस°; <ls>Me. 27.</ls> {@--2@} Frightened, made to tremble, startled; व्याधानुसारचकिता हिरणीव यासि <ls>Mk. 1. 17</ls>; <ls>Amaru. 46</ls>; <ls>Me. 14.</ls> {@--3@} Afraid, timid, apprehensive; चकितविलोकितसकलदिशा <ls>Gīt. 2</ls>; पौलस्त्यचकितेश्वराः (दिशः) <ls>R. 10. 73.</ls> --तं {@--1@} Trembling. {@--2@} Alarm, fear. --तं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} With fear, in a startled manner, alarmingly, with awe; चकितमुपैमि तथापि पार्श्वमस्य <ls>M. 1. 11</ls>; सभयचकितं <ls>Gīt. 5</ls>; <ls>Śānti. 4. 4.</ls>
